item.title: About
item.description: Hi! Welcome to my personal website. My name is Justin Singh-Mohudpur. I’m a Network and Systems Administrator for the US Air Force Reserves, and an undergraduate student at University of California, Santa Barbara for Mathematics and Spatial Science. View my resume here. Cryptography: I’ve participated in UCSB’s Directed Reading Program. You can see my group’s presentation on elliptic curve cryptography here. Geographic Information Systems: I’m currently taking the GIS sequence (GEOG176ABC) at UCSB.

item.title: Projects
item.description: R + GIS Using libraries from tidyverse, sf, and more. . ., I performed analysis on spatial datasets that covered various topic, such as: COVID-19 Flood Risk Analysis (Remote Sensing) Point-in-Polygon Analysis
